Text: thanks tons for continuing to seed, I'll do the same once I grab it

i saw this when it was first aired! To this day, every time it rains, i cant help but think of Margot...  

(i live in southen california where rain is almost as rare as a clear sky in this story, well not quite as rare...)
amazing share.  thank you for bringing back a long lost memory of my youth.
Please seed and I`ll seed back to you :)
